# Introduction

VuePress is developed by the developer of Vue.js Evan You. the main goal of building VuePress is to develop static site with the support of Vue-powered theme and to write technical documents easily, And it is SEO Friendly.
So We will clarify some basic terms related to VuePress, to ensure that if you are new to VuePress you won't have any problem catching up with the pace and Experienced people can also join.
